item.title: Projects
item.description: 🔐 Cryptography Secrete - ECIES implementation with Curve25519 LibSaltpack - A C++ implementation of saltpack Java Native Interface wrapper Aurora - Send and receive big files in chunks using IMAP, SMTP and asymmetrical encryption ☁️ Cloud and IaC Vault Backend - A Terraform HTTP backend that stores the state in a Vault secret pre-commit-java - A collection of git hooks for Java to be used with the pre-commit framework ✒️ Poetry and 🎹 music 📻 Ham Radio - M0HSE
